data.title: Hot list Ibiza top clubs
data.text:
Ibiza is world famous for its nightlife. Isla Bonita hosts the largest and most popular discos in the world, where every year the best DJs perform their performances.

Famous island of the Balearics, Ibiza is undoubtedly the undisputed queen of nightlife and the home of nightclubs. Here the parties follow one another day and night without stopping, among its numerous beach bars and clubs, including mega events and transgressive parties, all seasoned with its unique liveliness.

Amnesia

the most renowned and historic nightclubs on the island of Ibiza.

Opened in 1976, the venue has received some accolades such as Best Global Club in 2007, 2008, 2009 and 2011 at the IDMA Amnesia is one of Awards at the Miami Winter Music Conference.

It represents an institution in Ibiza as it is the real home of Marco Carola and his Music ON, one of the most famous and important festivals on the island.

The Amnesia also hosts the Pyramid party, also very popular, which involves many of the greatest artists on the planet.

You can’t leave the island without visiting this mega club!

Location: Ctra. Ibiza in San Antonio, Km 5, 07816 Ibiza, Balearic Islands, Spain

Ushuïa

Ushuaia is considered one of the best clubs in the world, consistently occupying the top 10 of the ranking of the best clubs ever since 2015.

It has a very particular characteristic, which helps to differentiate it from most existing clubs and to make it so important and known all over the world. The peculiarity of the club, in fact, is that of having the hotel rooms located directly on the dance floor, to guarantee its guests unique comforts and a crazy dose of constant and guaranteed fun!

It is undoubtedly the Ibiza club par excellence, home to Ibiza’s most renowned events and festivals and the best artists in the world.

Location: Ctra. De Platja d’en Bossa, 10, 07817 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Illes Balears, Spain

Hï Ibiza

Club located opposite Ushuaia, an integral part of the Palladyum group, which includes Ushuaia itself and the Hard Rock hotel group.

Hi Ibiza is a real institution for Techno music lovers. Taking part in an event of this club is equivalent to participating in a real 360-degree experience, which goes far beyond the simple concept of a disco party.

Your adventure will be really difficult to replicate elsewhere!

Location: Platja d’en Bossa, 07817 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Balearic Islands, Spain

Privilege

None other than the largest and most spectacular club in the world.

Once you’ve attended one of Privilege’s mega parties, you’ll be able to brag that you’ve literally been to the biggest club on Earth!

It is in fact defined by the Guinness Book of World Records as “the largest nightclub in the world, capable of accommodating around 10,000 people in its 6,500 m²”.

Location: Urbanización San Rafael, s / n, 07816 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Balearic Islands, Spain

DC 10

DC10 is already firmly part of the history of dance music culture.

The small discotheque has become famous thanks to its particular characteristic of being located at the end don the runway of Ibiza airport.

One of the best known clubbing destinations on the planet, it owes its success mainly to the hedonistic and no-holds-barred after-hours sessions of the Circo Loco Monday day party.

Location: Carretera las salinas, km 1, 07818 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Illes Balears, Spain

Pacha

Pacha in Ibiza is undoubtedly one of the most legendary nightclubs in history.

If you want to experience the Ibiza night to the fullest and at the same time find some celebrities here and there, this is definitely the right place!

It has a capacity of 3000 people and has a terrace at the top. His most famous parties are “F *** me I’m Famous” (the party of David Guetta, the most massive of the island without any doubt), “Tiesto: trance and progressive music” with Dj Tiesto and Flower Power: ancient and modern hippies, bright colors and music from the 50s to the 80s with DJ Piti, one of the founders of the club.

Location: Av. 8 d’Agost, 07800 Eivissa, Illes Balears, Spain
